name: Gensokyo Komarunner
description:
An online multiplayer versus racing game inspired by the PS1 game Gekisou Tomarunner (激走トマランナー)! Use your arms to interact with the environment and gain speed boosts to outrun your opponent.

Controls:

Arms - Left/Right Click,  LB/RB, Left + Right Click / LB + RB

Movement - WASD,  Left Stick

Jump - Spacebar,  A

Boost - Shift,  X
